nodes.text: Balmgrass grew in fields along the shores of the Silver Sea, a body of water located near the Core World of Chandrila's capital, Hanna City. The grass was consumed by the cairnmog, a species of lizard that lived on the world.
Balmgrass first appeared in Greg Keyes's 2001 novel The New Jedi Order: Edge of Victory II: Rebirth, the eighth volume of the Star Wars: The New Jedi Order series.
